Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Model.GoalCard

Class GoalCard

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Model.GoalCard.GoalCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiagonalGoalCard, ObjectsGoalCard, ResourceGoalCard, StepGoalCard
public abstract class GoalCard extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a goal card in the game. Subclasses must implement the calcScore(Board) method to calculate the score based on specific criteria.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GoalCard

      public GoalCard(int points, String goaltype, int cardID)
      Constructs a GoalCard with specified points, goal type, and card ID.
      Parameters:
      points - The points awarded for achieving this goal.
      goaltype - The type of goal this card represents.
      cardID - The unique identifier for this card.

  • Method Details

      Returns:
      The points awarded for achieving this goal.

    • getGoalType

      public String getGoalType()
      Getter for the goalType attribute of the goal card.
      Returns:
      The type of goal this card represents.

    • calcScore

      public abstract int calcScore(Board playerBoard)
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses. Calculates the score for achieving the goal based on the player's board state.
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - The player's board containing cards and cells.
      Returns:
      The calculated score based on the specific criteria of the goal card.

    • getCardID

      public int getCardID()
      Getter for the cardID attribute of the goal card.
      Returns:
      The unique identifier for this card.
